alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Erie and Crawford Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Waterford to near Edinboro to Greenville. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Linesville, Wattsburg, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Cochranton, Saegertown, Conneaut Lake and Jamestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
